Text:
Thanks HMV!

I only knew the name...not the music.

(I thought Pat was a man...LOL!)

Lovin' it :)
lol though so, Benatar is pretty famous

There's no point to making Vinyl rips when there's Digital quality available.  There's so much added noise reduction used this is a waste of time IMO, for the quality is much less than Digital.  Raising the Bit Rate does not improve the quality from an inferior source.  Here's a link to the Digital rip, http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6650009/Pat_Benatar_-_In_The_Heat_Of_The_Night
